note:
Hi, my name is Althea (Thea for short.)

Born in the 80s. transfem on HRT since Nov 2022. I came out as a non-binary transfemme sapphic in March 2023

I work as a software engineer with some embedded/hardware design.

Hobbies include 3D printing, CNC, machining, sewing, jewellery.

I read a lot, it is my escape. I game but my brain is not up to it most days.

I have chronic insomnia, depression, and social anxiety. Am I neurotypical? I don't think so but I don't have 5 grand to get diagnosed!
